Text: Yes... I created this torrent because I was looking everywhere for Carmageddon for PSP... So I decided to make my own... The game works with no problem... I've tested it on two PSP's... If you get any trouble please let me know...

@just1fixx

I did a bit of research on your problem... From what I saw Custom Themes tend to give this issue with psx converted games... Sorry for the inconvenience, but I can't do anything about it.

Here is one of my sources for this issue:

http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/544527

Ghost416

If anyone completed the download please let me know if it works... If I get enough people interested in my uploads then I will upload more things... I will also improve on future uploads for example art work for converted games...
